main event: On 23 October 1957, a torpedo-shaped object with four trails of light was witnessed departing into two parts with a fan-shaped reddish flame between them over Kisalon, Mindanao.
interesting points: The object separated into two parts and disappeared rapidly,It was suggested that this sighting could potentially be a meteor sighting,There were several witnesses, including Father Llorente, who reported the event,The object was described as having four trails of flame and moving with unusual speed, An aerial reconnaissance of the area was attempted but was hindered by low clouds and severe turbulence.
sighted object: Torpedo-shaped object with four trails of light
witness description: Father Llorente, a former chemistry and math instructor at Fordham University, and several villagers.
